message: feat: Major portfolio enhancements and UX improvements
title: feat: Major portfolio enhancements and UX improvements
content:
FEATURE: feat: Major portfolio enhancements and UX improvements

- Enhanced About Me section with MagicUI Highlighter and improved typography
- Replaced custom IconCloud with professional 21st.dev Interactive Icon Cloud
- Updated tab switcher icons (PocketKnife, Brain) and refreshed tools list
- Cleaned up section headers (removed icons/subheaders, consistent styling)
- Added balanced 'Currently Exploring' badge to Education section
- Fixed mobile section ordering (Education first on mobile)
- Improved ExpandableTabs component with smooth transitions
- Updated toolSlugs array with current tools (added claude, spotify, apple, removed sketch, adobexd)
- Enhanced overall visual consistency and professional appearance

message: feat: implement comprehensive performance optimization system and fix marquee jitter
title: feat: implement comprehensive performance optimization system and fix marquee jitter
content:
FEATURE: feat: implement comprehensive performance optimization system and fix marquee jitter

- Add global performance mode hook for adaptive animations
- Create performance-optimized hexagon background component
- Implement smart performance detection during user interactions
- Fix marquee rubber banding with seamless infinite loops
- Add expandable tabs component for skills/tools toggle
- Optimize Framer Motion spring physics for buttery smooth motion
- Update skills content with accurate professional descriptions
- Add Figma icon to icon component library
- Implement CSS mask gradients for smooth edge fading
- Create adaptive animation system based on user activity

Performance improvements:
- Background animations simplify during interactions
- IconCloud becomes ultra-responsive in performance mode
- Skills marquee adapts speed and travel distance
- Reduced GPU load during heavy user interactions
- Smooth transitions between performance modes

message: feat: replace central J with WebGL orb and fix mobile orbit responsiveness
title: feat: replace central J with WebGL orb and fix mobile orbit responsiveness
content:
FEATURE: feat: replace central J with WebGL orb and fix mobile orbit responsiveness

- Add new WebGL orb component using OGL library
- Replace basic pulsing J with interactive shader-based orb
- Fix mobile orbit radius to be static (180px) across all screen sizes
- Maintain all existing orbital timeline functionality
- Add hover effects and smooth rotation to orb
